name: Aliens ate my slippers!
description:
Aliens ate my slippers! is a classic shoot-em-up.

  • Simple gameplay
  • Windows only
  • runs in 640 x 480 mode

As the alien invaders - the Newtoids - emerge from their ship they storm toward your position. Can you evade their gnashing teeth and sharp claws by blasting them with your twin neutron disintegrator ray cannon? Stop them in their tracks before they reach you or they will rip you to shreds.

Extra lives awarded at intervals. There are 14 levels followed by a boss level. Shoot the boss saucer multiple times to destroy it. Complete the boss level and progress - but slightly harder. Repeat 3 times to win the game.

This game is UNCLASSIFIED but is suitable for ages 7 and older. Contains mild, unrealistic violence (e.g. violence in a cartoon context), and elements that can be frightening to younger children.
